item.title: Here’s what to know about chronic venous insufficiency
item.description: Swollen legs led to President Donald Trump being diagnosed with what’s called chronic venous insufficiency.

item.title: For Sale: Trump is leveraging power of his office to reap profits for family businesses
Takeaways from the AP’s reporting on Trump’s business deals
